mission: Verify ocean theme on specialized feature pages (AI, Talent Match, Life CEO, etc.)

TalentMatchPage.ocean_theme_notes: Uses generic gradient 'from-primary via-secondary to-accent', no ocean-specific colors
TalentMatchPage.ai_interface_notes: Well-styled AI talent matching interface with Brain icons and AI-powered badges
TalentMatchPage.dark_mode_notes: Some dark mode support but missing comprehensive dark: variants
TalentMatchPage.i18n_notes: All text hardcoded in English, no i18n implementation
TalentMatchPage.interactive_notes: Uses hover-elevate, framer-motion animations, proper theming on buttons

PartnerFinderPage.ocean_theme_notes: Generic hero section with glassmorphic effects, no ocean colors
PartnerFinderPage.dark_mode_notes: Limited dark mode support, missing dark: variants on many elements

LifeCEODashboardPage.ocean_theme_notes: Custom gradients per agent (primary/accent, orange/amber, etc.) but no ocean theme
LifeCEODashboardPage.ai_interface_notes: Excellent AI agent cards with Brain icons, well-styled agent network
LifeCEODashboardPage.dark_mode_notes: Some support but not comprehensive across all agents
LifeCEODashboardPage.interactive_notes: hover-elevate, animations on agent cards, StatsCard components

MrBlueChatPage.ocean_theme_notes: Uses glass-topbar and glass-card but not ocean-specific theming
MrBlueChatPage.ai_interface_notes: Well-designed chat interface with Bot icons, message cards
MrBlueChatPage.dark_mode_notes: Basic support with glass effects but missing dark: variants

mr-blue-video-demo.ai_interface_notes: Video state selector well-styled with expression badges and icons

AvatarDesignerPage.ocean_theme_notes: Generic hero section and cards, no ocean theme
AvatarDesignerPage.ai_interface_notes: Avatar generation UI with Sparkles icon, AI-themed badges

LiveStreamPage.dark_mode_notes: Basic support, missing comprehensive dark: variants

StreamDetailPage.ocean_theme_notes: Uses border-ocean-divider once but not comprehensive ocean theme
StreamDetailPage.dark_mode_notes: Better dark mode support with FadeInSection animations

albums.ocean_theme_notes: Basic container styling, no ocean theme

album-detail.ocean_theme_notes: Basic container styling, no ocean theme

TravelPlannerPage.ocean_theme_notes: Generic hero with gradient overlay, no ocean colors

VisualEditorPage.ocean_theme_notes: Explicitly uses border-ocean-divider, ocean theme implemented
VisualEditorPage.ai_interface_notes: Comprehensive Mr Blue integration with voice interface and chat
VisualEditorPage.interactive_notes: Comprehensive interactions, resizable panels, live preview

MemoriesPage.dark_mode_notes: Excellent dark mode with explicit dark: variants (dark:bg-amber-950/30, etc.)

critical_issues: Ocean theme NOT implemented on 14 of 15 specialized feature pages
i18n completely missing on ALL 15 pages - all text hardcoded in English
Dark mode support inconsistent - only 3 pages have comprehensive support
Only VisualEditorPage has proper ocean theme with border-ocean-divider
AI interfaces are well-styled where present but lack ocean theme integration

recommendations.action: Implement ocean-specific color tokens across all specialized pages
suggested_changes: Replace generic 'from-primary via-secondary to-accent' with ocean gradients
Use ocean color palette for badges, cards, and interactive elements

recommendations.action: Implement react-i18next on all specialized feature pages
suggested_changes: Replace hardcoded text with useTranslation hook
Create translation keys for all user-facing text
Add translation files for supported languages (en, es, fr, de, it, pt)
Ensure SEO component also supports i18n

recommendations.action: Standardize dark mode implementation across all pages
suggested_changes: Add explicit dark: variants for all visual elements
Ensure text contrast meets accessibility standards in dark mode
Test all interactive elements in dark mode
Use consistent dark mode patterns like MemoriesPage

recommendations.action: Ensure AI-related pages have consistent branding
suggested_changes: Create consistent AI badge styling across pages
Integrate ocean theme into AI interfaces

test_coverage_gaps: No i18n language switching tests for any specialized pages
Dark mode toggle tests missing for most pages
Ocean theme consistency tests not present
conclusion: FAIL - Specialized feature pages lack ocean theme implementation and i18n support. Only VisualEditorPage properly implements ocean theme. Dark mode support is inconsistent. Critical refactoring needed to align with platform standards.
